list.description: The Escape's 2015 sleek, muscular shape contributes to improved fuel efficiency and cargo handling, while it's modern, kinetic design creates a sense of movement even when Escape is stading still. Up front, the large trapezoidal lower grille Escape a signature Ford look with styling cues carried all the way to the back, where the liftgate flows into the lower fascia for a finished, sculpted look.
